newsitem.title: USA: Persoft signs Tech Data distribution pact.
newsitem.headline: Persoft signs Tech Data distribution pact.

text.p: Persoft Inc, a provider of PC-to-host connectivity products, said Tuesday it signed a distribution agreement with Tech Data Corp.
Under the agreement Tech Data will distribute Persoft's SmarTerm products to federal, state and local governments and to education markets.

SmarTerm products provide personal computer users with advanced connectivity for access to corporate information on host systems. Tech Data distributes personal computer products serving more than 50,000 resellers and retail dealers.
